section.title: bookings reporting for Bookings
section.para: The "Bookings" screen provides information on all open, invoiced, and closed Sales Order Line Items. Here are some tips for using this screen:

listitem.para: Because bookings represent both active and past Customer demand, Sales Order Line Items that have been deleted before any activity is registered are not considered bookings.
Be sure to enable all the column headers you want to see in order to take full advantage of the data available on this screen.
Isolate the sales information you're looking for by building a custom search filter.
Don't forget to save your custom search filters so you and others in your organization can use them for future searches.
Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Order Date.
